tasks.task: Adjusting the pressure on the air springs of a Combine Harvester
subtasks: Physically approach the Combine Harvester to check air springs
Inspect the air springs for any signs of damage or wear
Use hands to feel the pressure of the air springs
Operate the pressure adjustment lever or knob on the Combine Harvester
Monitor the air pressure gauge as adjusting to ensure correct level

tasks.task: Guiding the Combine Harvester through crop rows
subtasks: Steer the Combine Harvester using the steering wheel or hydraulics
Adjust harvest speed by controlling the throttle lever
Monitor crop swath and make manual corrections to keep within rows

tasks.task: Loading grain into the combine's bin
subtasks: Operate the grain elevator or conveyor belt to transfer grain
Watch for blockages or clogs and clear them manually
Monitor grain moisture content and stop harvest if necessary

tasks.task: Attaching and detaching air hoses to the machine
subtasks: Locate air hose connections on the Combine Harvester or trailer
Grip and connect/disconnect air hose using hands and sometimes tools
Ensure proper seal and prevent air leaks

tasks.task: Aligning the Combine Harvester with the previous row
subtasks: Observe marked paths or previous harvest lines
Adjust steering to maintain even spacing between rows
Use implement ranking or GPS guidance if available

tasks.task: Getting on and off the Combine Harvester during operation
subtasks: Secure the seat or cab before operating
Exit the machine safely when needed, using steps or ramps
Transition between the machine and ground while wearing protective gear
Ensure personal safety measures are observed during movement

tasks.task: Checking for obstructions and hazards in the field
subtasks: Walk the perimeter of the field after harvest to look for debris
Inspect harvest paths for any downed crops or machinery damage
Report or address any safety concerns found

tasks.task: Climbing on and off the trailer attached to the Combine Harvester
subtasks: Ascend the trailer steps or ramp
Secure footing when traversing uneven surfaces
Disembark safely, ensuring balance especially with heavy load

tasks.task: Loading the trailer's hopper with additional equipment
subtasks: Navigate to the trailer and open the gate or flap
Use hands and potentially tools to load items into the hopper
Secure the load to prevent movement during transport

tasks.task: Driving the Combine Harvester on public roads
subtasks: Control the steering while路况变化
Adhere to speed limits and local traffic laws
Use turn signals properly when changing lanes or turning

tasks.task: Stopping the Combine Harvester for a quick check
subtasks: Apply the brakes safely and bring the machine to a stop
Verify if the air pressure is still adequate in the tires
Inspect fluid levels quickly before resuming operation

tasks.task: Riding in the back of the Combine Harvester during operation
subtasks: Adjust seating position for balance and visibility
Secure oneself against overturning during turns or over rough terrain
Assist in spotting obstructions or monitor the field from another vantage point if needed
